title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 122.12 - Continuing education
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 122.12 - Continuing education

State Regulations

The Chief Administrator may require
judicial hearing officers to participate in educational courses, seminars and
training sessions designed to ensure that they keep current with developments
in the law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
122.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
